Ext.toolbar.Fill Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.Toolbar.Fill
  • Ext.toolbar.Fill

[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.toolbar.Fill Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Toolbar Fill Example',
        width: 300,
        height: 200,
        tbar: ['Item 1',
        {
            xtype: 'tbfill'
        }, 'Item 2'],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
